statements: SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_type, severity FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_type, description FROM security_incidents WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_type FROM security_incidents WHERE severity > 3 ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE description LIKE '%security breach%' AND severity >= 4;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, description FROM security_incidents ORDER BY severity ASC, incident_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT incident_type FROM security_incidents WHERE severity = 5;
SELECT incident_date, incident_type FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Leak' OR severity < 2 ORDER BY incident_date, severity DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_description, incident_type FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT report_title, report_details FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach' ORDER BY incident_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT incident_description, incident_date, incident_type FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY report_title;
SELECT report_title, report_details FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents si JOIN compliance_reports cr ON si.incident_type = cr.report_title WHERE si.incident_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_description FROM security_incidents WHERE status='Open';
SELECT reported_by, incident_id FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE compliance_status='Non-Compliant';
SELECT report_date, report_details FROM incident_reports ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_description, reported_by, status FROM security_incidents WHERE status='pending';

SELECT security_incidents.incident_id, security_incidents.incident_description, incident_reports.report_date, compliance_audit.audit_result FROM security_incidents JOIN incident_reports ON security_incidents.incident_id = incident_reports.incident_id JOIN compliance_audit ON incident_reports.report_id = compliance_audit.report_id WHERE compliance_status='pass';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, reported_by FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE compliance_status='fail' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, location FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_date, description FROM security_incidents;
SELECT * FROM incident_details WHERE reporter_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT incident_id, details FROM incident_details WHERE incident_id = 1 ORDER BY detail_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach' ORDER BY incident_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, location FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date > '2021-01-01' AND incident_date < '2021-06-30';

SELECT incident_id, reporter_name, report_date, details FROM incident_details INNER JOIN security_incidents ON incident_details.incident_id = security_incidents.incident_id WHERE incident_type = 'Unauthorized Access' LIMIT 10;
SELECT incident_id, report_date, compliance_status, description FROM compliance_reports WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant' AND report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT incident_id, status, update_date FROM incident_status WHERE status = 'Resolved' ORDER BY update_date;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents
SELECT id, date, severity FROM security_incidents WHERE severity > 3
SELECT * FROM incident_locations ORDER BY location_name ASC
SELECT location_name, address FROM incident_locations WHERE address IS NOT NULL
SELECT type_name, details FROM incident_types
SELECT * FROM security_incidents ORDER BY date DESC, severity ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT description, severity FROM security_incidents WHERE severity > 2 ORDER BY description
SELECT location_name, address FROM incident_locations WHERE location_id < 10
SELECT ir.report_id, ir.report_date, it.type_name FROM incident_reports ir INNER JOIN incident_types it ON ir.incident_id = it.type_id LIMIT 5

SELECT ic.compliance_id, ic.compliance_date, s.date FROM compliance_reports ic INNER JOIN security_incidents s ON ic.incident_id = s.id WHERE ic.compliance_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY ic.compliance_date ASC
